  • Package shapes

    • Class shapes.ArbitrarySimplePolygon extends Shape implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1602472072L

      • Serialized Fields

        • points

          java.awt.Point[] points
          The Points which specify a path that forms a simple polygon. Each consecutive pair of Points are the ends of a line segment of the Polygon, with an additional line segment between the first and last element. No guarantees are made that the points represent an actual simple polygon.

        • awtPolygon

          java.awt.Polygon awtPolygon
          The java.awt.Polygon which holds an identical point list as points. Used only in ArbitrarySimplePolygon.draw(Graphics).

        • rotation

          int rotation
          The amount, in degrees, this polygon is rotated from its intial orientation. A positive value results in an anticlockwise rotation. The polygon is rotated relative to the origin, then translated back so that its x and y still represent the coordinates of the top left corner of its bounding (non-rotated) rectangle.

    • Class shapes.Circle extends Ellipse implements Serializable

    • Class shapes.InvalidShapeException extends java.lang.RuntimeException implements Serializable

    • Class shapes.NonPositiveDimensionException extends InvalidShapeException implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dimension

          int dimension
          The non-positive dimension which caused this exception.

    • Class shapes.OrientedPolygon extends ArbitrarySimplePolygon implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1602471327L

      • Serialized Fields

        • base

          int base
          The length of this OrientedPolygon's base. The base is the single straight horizontal edge which lies exactly on the bottom edge of the bounding box of this shape, i.e. the lowest y coordinate for some rotation of the polygon.

          No guarantees are made that the Point list has an edge which corresponds to this attribute.

        • height

          int height
          The height of this OrientedPolygon. The height is the length of the longest possible straight line segment perpendicular to the base, between the base and another point within the polygon.

          No guarantees are made that the Point list has a height which corresponds to this attribute.

    • Class shapes.Parallelogram extends Trapezoid implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1602471308L

      1602471272L

    • Class shapes.Shape extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1602488594L

      • Serialized Fields

        • color

          java.awt.Color color
          The Colour to draw this Shape with.

        • x

          int x
          The x coordinate of this Shape. The x coordinate is the leftmost (smallest) x coordinate this Shape covers, i.e. the x coordinate of this Shape's bounding box left edge.

        • y

          int y
          The y coordinate of this Shape. The y coordinate is the topmost (largest) y coordinate this Shape covers, i.e. the y coordinate of this Shape's bounding box top edge.

        • area

          double area
          The area of this Shape. A negative value means the area has not been initialized yet, however only private access to the area attribute could result in the retrieval of an uninitialized value.

        • perimeter

          double perimeter
          The perimeter of this Shape. A negative value means the perimeter has not been initialized yet, however only private access to the perimeter attribute could result in the retrieval of an uninitialized value.

    • Class shapes.Trapezoid extends OrientedPolygon implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1602471183L

      • Serialized Fields

        • oppositeBase

          int oppositeBase
          The length of the opposite edge parallel to this Trapezoid's base.

          No guarantees are made that the Point list has an edge which corresponds to this attribute.

          See Also:
          OrientedPolygon.getBase()

      serialVersionUID:
      1602471157L
